questions.question: In the end, Maria --- the operation on her leg as the orthopaedic surgeon said that the problem could be treated with physiotherapy.
questions.explanation: 'needn't have + past participle' geçmişte gerekli olmayan bir eylemi ifade eder. Maria'nın ameliyat olması gerekmiyordu çünkü problem fizik tedavi ile çözülebilirdi.

questions.question: Disasters on the earth --- dangerous, but most probably the biggest threat to humans --- space.
options: might have seemed / must come from
are to seem / needn't come from
don't need to seem / can't come from
questions.explanation: 'may seem' olasılık, 'will come from' gelecek tahmini ifade eder. Dünyadaki felaketler tehlikeli görünebilir ama en büyük tehdit uzaydan gelecek.

questions.question: There is no point in phoning Maggie at the office because she --- already.
questions.explanation: 'must have + past participle' geçmişte olmuş olması muhtemel bir eylemi ifade eder. Maggie muhtemelen ofisten ayrılmıştır.

questions.question: School days --- the best days of your life and usually part of that experience can involve some strenuous physical activity.
questions.explanation: 'are supposed to be' genel kabul gören bir inanışı ifade eder. Okul günlerinin hayatın en güzel günleri olduğu düşünülür.

questions.question: You --- so much food as there was plenty of food left over from the party and most of it was untouched so we could have eaten that.
questions.explanation: 'needn't have + past participle' geçmişte gerekli olmayan bir eylemi ifade eder. Partiden kalan yemekler varken yemek pişirmene gerek yoktu.

questions.question: I --- up to my office on the tenth floor because the lift had stopped working.
questions.explanation: 'had to' geçmişte zorunluluk ifade eder. Asansör bozulduğu için 10. kata yürümek zorunda kaldım.

questions.question: You --- your present job until you find another one.
questions.explanation: 'had better not' tavsiye/uyarı ifade eder. Başka iş bulana kadar şimdiki işini bırakmaman daha iyi olur.

questions.question: When a baby has reached his first birthday, he --- or even stand up without the help of an adult.
options: should be able to sit up
questions.explanation: 'should be able to' yetenek/beklenti ifade eder. Bir bebek bir yaşına geldiğinde oturabilmeli hatta ayakta durabilmelidir.

questions.question: Some teachers argue that students who - a calculator - how to do mental calculations.
options: are used to using / may forget
might have used / would have forgotten
questions.explanation: 'are used to using' alışkanlık, 'may forget' olasılık ifade eder. Hesap makinesi kullanmaya alışan öğrenciler zihinden hesap yapmayı unutabilirler.

questions.question: When the weather becomes colder, we - that the air mass - in the Arctic rather than over the Gulf of Mexico.
questions.explanation: 'must have + past participle' geçmişte kesin olması muhtemel bir durumu ifade eder. Hava soğuduğunda, hava kütlesinin Arktik'ten geldiğini biliriz.
